QuestData.Title: Rise, Forsaken
QuestData.Description: Fenris Isle stands defiantly at the heart of Lordamere Lake - a cruel memory of a time long since passed.$B$BThough no longer infested by gnoll vermin, a new threat has emerged. Human refugees, driven from their holdings in Hillsbrad, have fled to Fenris Isle in hopes of escaping defeat at our hands. A critical error on their part.$B$BYou are to take Agatha with you to Fenris Isle and slaughter all humans. She will raise the fallen as Forsaken, bolstering our forces in the process.$B$BDo not fail me, $n.
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: The humans will fare better in the afterlife as Forsaken.
QuestData.LogDescription: Raise 15 Forsaken by killing humans on Fenris Isle.
QuestData.RewardText: I see everything, $n. Through Agatha all is known to me.
